Package com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.recognition

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SpenRecognitionBase.ResultListener
    This listener interface provides callback methods for receiving recognition results when you call SpenRecognitionBase.request(List).
    SpenSignatureVerification.ResultListener
    This listener interface provides callback methods for getting signature recognition results.
    Register this listener to get results for the SpenSignatureVerification.request(List) method.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SpenEquationRecognition
    This class provides the functionality for recognizing handwritten equations.
    SpenEquationRecognitionManager
    This class provides the methods for managing SpenEquationRecognition instance.
    SpenRecognitionBase
    This class provides the basic Pen recognition methods.
    SpenRecognitionInfo
    This class contains the information on recognition plug-ins.
    SpenRecognitionManager
    This class provides methods for managing recognition instance.
    SpenShapeRecognition
    This class provides the functionality for recognizing polygons and other shapes
    SpenShapeRecognitionManager
    This class provides the methods for managing SpenShapeRecognition instance.
    SpenSignatureVerification
    This class provides methods for signature verification.
    SpenSignatureVerificationInfo
    This class contains the information on signature verification plug-ins.
    SpenSignatureVerificationManager
    This class provides the methods for managing SpenSignatureVerification instance.
    SpenTextRecognition
    This class provides the functionality for text recognition.
    SpenTextRecognitionManager
    This class provides the methods for managing SpenTextRecognition instances.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SpenCreationFailureException
    Thrown when the equation recognizer cannot be created.
